# PADM for Relu Networks

```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(rmarkdown)
library(tikzDevice)
suppressMessages(library(dplyr))
suppressMessages(library(knitr))
suppressMessages(library(kableExtra))
```

## Loading Results

```{r}
data = read.csv("results.csv", header = FALSE)
colnames(data) = c("tag", "method", "instance", "network", "status", "best_obj", "time", "n_vars", "n_ctrs")

data = data %>% select(-tag)
data = data %>% mutate(instance = sub("^.*//", "", instance))
data = data %>% mutate(network = sub("^.*pre_trained_models/", "", network))
data = data %>% mutate(time = ifelse(time >= 600, 600, time))
data = data %>% mutate(best_obj = ifelse(best_obj >= 1e15, NA, best_obj))
data = data %>% mutate(warm_start = ifelse(grepl("warm-start", method, ignore.case = TRUE), "Warm-Start", "No Warm-Start"))

data = data %>%
  mutate(
    architecture_name = sub("/.*", "", instance),
    num_layers = as.integer(sub(".*_(\\d+)layer.*", "\\1", architecture_name)),
    hidden_units = as.integer(sub(".*_(\\d+)hidden.*", "\\1", architecture_name)),
    delta = as.integer(sub(".*delta_(\\d+).*", "\\1", architecture_name)),
    architecture = purrr::map2_chr(
          num_layers, hidden_units,
          ~ paste(
            c("784", rep(.y, .x), "10"),
            collapse = ","
          )
        )
    )

data = data %>% filter(delta == 10)

paged_table(data)
```

```{r}
summary_table <- data %>%
  group_by(method, architecture) %>%
  summarize(
    Avg_Time_All = mean(time),
    Avg_Time_Opt = mean(time[status == "Feasible"], na.rm = TRUE),
    Avg_Obj = mean(best_obj, na.rm = TRUE),
    Num_Opt = sum(status %in% c("Optimal")),
    Num_Feas = sum(status %in% c("Optimal", "Feasible")),
    num_layers = mean(num_layers),
    hidden_units = mean(hidden_units)
  ) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  arrange(method, num_layers, hidden_units) %>%
  select(-num_layers, -hidden_units)

kable(
  summary_table,
  col.names = c("Method", "Architecture", "Avg. Time (All)", "Avg. Time (Feas)", "Avg. Obj.", "Num. Opt.", "Num. Feas."),
  booktabs = TRUE
)
```

```{r, fig.width=10}
ggplot(data, aes(x = time, color = method, linetype = warm_start)) +
  stat_ecdf(linewidth = 1) +
  facet_wrap(~ architecture) +
  #scale_x_log10() +
  labs(
    title = "ECDF of Time by Architecture and Method",
    color = "Method"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()

ggplot(data %>% mutate(best_obj = ifelse(is.na(best_obj), max(best_obj, na.rm = TRUE), best_obj)), aes(x = best_obj, color = method, linetype = warm_start)) +
  stat_ecdf(linewidth = 1) +
  facet_wrap(~ architecture) +
  #scale_x_log10() +
  labs(
    title = "ECDF of Objective by Architecture and Method",
    color = "Method"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
```
